thesis: Deadline Sunday AM revised 4-day estimate is $17.8M (up from $15M pre-release). 87% RT score, +75% Saturday surge, Valentine Day catalyst. Presidents Day Monday will add to total. High confidence in $17-20M bucket.
invalidation: Final 4-day box office from The-Numbers comes in below $17M despite Deadline revised estimate. Would require Sunday+Monday significantly underperforming Saturday.
